She suggested the Watcher start with Zili, a more easygoing member of the Valera family. ## Walkthrough * After [Salt in the Wound](/saltInTheWound/), head to the Bardatto estate and talk to [Ezzali Bardatto](/ezzaliBardatto/). Talk to her and she will reveal that there are rumors of a Valera plot against her family. She will ask that you go and interrogate [Zili Valera](/ziliValera/) by the watchtowers to learn of the plans. Talk to him and he will tell you to find [Persa](/persa/) in [The Hole](/theHole/). * Head to the Hole, in the Gullet district of Neketaka. Persa is standing in the store room with [Baer](/baer/). You can eavesdrop on them in stealth mode. If they notice you, Persa will immediately question your presence. You can use Bluff 2 and Might to get out (but this will not advance the quest). Use Perception 16/Insight 3 to identify Baer as a Bardatto guard and you'll have to fight the whole group. * Once you have the information, return to Ezzali. ## Bugs *If you have been caught by Persa once already but talked your way out of a fight, the trigger for being caught the second time doesn't disappear even after the quest has concluded and the conspirators are no longer at the Hole. This causes forced dialogue with the now-absent Baer, but doesn't appear to cause any other issues. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_TSK_Bardatto_Favor.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''A Sinking Feeling''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Ezzali Bardatto is convinced that the Valera family is planning to make a move against her. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Find Zili Valera.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Ezzali Bardatto asked me to seek out information regarding a Valera plot against her. She suggested I start with Zili, a more easygoing member of the Valera family. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | Ezzali said that Zili Valera plays his lute around one of the local watch towers. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | Zili Valera has been killed. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Find Persa.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Zili's pointed me toward his cousin, Persa, who frequents a tavern known as The Hole down in the Gullet. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | Zili Valera has been killed. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Ezzali.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I think I've found all the information I'm going to. I don't think she'll be asking me for help again anytime soon. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30003 | I told Ezzali about the plan to rob her vault. I'll need to work fast if I'm going to convince anyone of that. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30004 | I told Ezzali about the plan to rob her vault. She's eager to turn the tables on the thieves. Looks like things are going to get bloody in a hurry. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30005 | With the feud resolved, Ezzali has no use for this information. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30007 | The Valera family has already put their plan in motion- and it doesn't seem to be going very well.
